property.name: format
property.description: If the min and/or max dates are a string, this will specify the format the date is in. If no format is specified the default format in A5.d.date.format will be used. See *[link:Date.toFormat]* for a full list of format values.

page.description: Extension to the native date variable to allow the date variable to be constrained to a min and/or max.
